summary: 2008 MERCEDES BENZ E350W. CONSUMER WRITES IN REGARDS TO WIRING HARNESS ON CAMSHAFT ADJUSTER SOLENOID SAFETY RECALL. *LD    THE CONSUMER STATED THE VEHICLE HAD MULTIPLE FAILURES INCLUDING THE SUSPENSION, TIRES, UNDERCARRIAGE, AND THE VEHICLE'S FRAME. THE CONSUMER STATED THE VEHICLE LEANS FROM ONE SIDE TO THE OTHER. *JS
